official-title.#text:
To permit the Delegate from the Commonwealth of the
		  Northern Mariana Islands to designate Federal depository
		  libraries.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Northern Mariana Islands Federal Depository Library Act of
			 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 1905
			 of title 44, United States Code

			 Mariana Islands
